data.text: @andoo301 When will u stream? When u feel better
@andoo301 Andoo please get some rest. if you feel good to stream, you feel good to stream. but please take care of yourself first! We'll be here when you're better. ❤️
@andoo301 Covid is kicking your ass? Hold on, I'm bringing my gun (cause I live in America) and I'm flying to australia and shooting that piece of shit known as covid.
@andoo301 whatever you feel like doing is cool, don't force yourself to stream if you don't feel great <3 (it would be swag thoo)
@andoo301 only stream if you are really feeling up to it! i hope you start feeling better soon, covid sucks
@andoo301 I swear if you stream whilst I'm still at school Imma remove your bitch privlages
